short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Don't use unless you hate chess...Will cause extreme laughter and terrible blunders...

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Every time you make a move on chess.com, a meme sound plays.

Check out my YouTube channel for updates on the extension! 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgbVffOrqoaN8F3lLty2ubA

NOTE: The extension will not automatically start playing sounds when you boot up a game. You must click off the chess.com tab, onto another tab, and then click back onto the chess.com tab. The extension only works during chess games. If for whatever reason the extension breaks (like playing multiple sounds at once), reload the tab and repeat the clicking off and then back on the tab. This will reload the extension. If this doesn't really make sense, see my video on the extension.
